original: Majjhima Nikāya 18
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Madhupiṇḍikasutta
analyzed: madhupiṇḍika sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmin nigrodha ārāme

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kapilavatthuṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya kapilavatthum piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Kapilavatthusmiṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāya.
analyzed: kapilavatthusmim piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ yena mahā vanam tena upasaṅkami divāvihārāya

original: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: mahā vanam ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāram nisīdi

original: Daṇḍapāṇipi kho sakko jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: kho sakkaḥ jaṅghāvihāram anucaṅkamamānaḥ anuvicaramānaḥ yena mahā vanam tena upasaṅkami

original: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā yena beluvalaṭṭhikā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: mahā vanam ajjhogāhetvā yena beluvalaṭṭhikā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā daṇḍamolubbha ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho daṇḍapāṇi sakko bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā daṇḍa molubbhaḥ ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho daṇḍapāṇi sakkaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “kiṁvādī samaṇo kimakkhāyī”ti?
analyzed: ki vādī samaṇaḥ kim akkhāyi iti

original: “Yathāvādī kho, āvuso, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya
analyzed: yathāvādī khalu āvuso sa devake loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇiyā pajāya

original: sadevamanussāya na kenaci loke viggayha tiṭṭhati, yathā ca pana kāmehi visaṁyuttaṁ
analyzed: sa deva manussāya na kenacid loke viggayha tiṭṭhati yathā ca pana kāmehi

original: viharantaṁ taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ akathaṅkathiṁ chinnakukkuccaṁ bhavābhave vītataṇhaṁ saññā nānusenti—
analyzed: viharantam tam brāhmaṇam akathaṅkathim chinna kukkuccam bhava abhave vīta taṇham saññāḥ na anusenti

original: evaṁvādī kho ahaṁ, āvuso, evamakkhāyī”ti.
analyzed: eva vādī kho aha āvuso evam akkhāyi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, daṇḍapāṇi sakko sīsaṁ okampetvā, jivhaṁ nillāḷetvā, tivisākhaṁ nalāṭikaṁ nalāṭe vuṭṭhāpetvā daṇḍamolubbha pakkāmi.
analyzed: evam vutte daṇḍapāṇi sakkaḥ sīsam okampetvā jivham nillāḷetvā tivisākham nalāṭikam nalāṭe vuṭṭhāpetvā daṇḍam olubbha pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena nigrodhārāmo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena nigrodha ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “idhāhaṁ, bhikkhave, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kapilavatthuṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
analyzed: idha āha bhikkhave pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya kapilavatthum piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Kapilavatthusmiṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁ divāvihārāya.
analyzed: kapilavatthusmim piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ yena mahā vanam tena upasaṅkamim divāvihārāya

original: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdiṁ.
analyzed: mahā vanam ajjhogāhetvā beluvalaṭṭhikāya mūle divāvihāram nisīdi

original: Daṇḍapāṇipi kho, bhikkhave, sakko jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno yena mahāvanaṁ tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: daṇḍapāṇi pi kho bhikkhave sakkaḥ jaṅghāvihāram anucaṅkamamānaḥ anuvicaramānaḥ yena mahā vanam tena upasaṅkami

original: Mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā yena beluvalaṭṭhikā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā mayā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: mahā vanam ajjhogāhetvā yena beluvalaṭṭhikā yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mayā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā daṇḍamolubbha ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho, bhikkhave, daṇḍapāṇi sakko maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā daṇḍam olubbhe ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho bhikkhave daṇḍapāṇi sakkaḥ mama etat avoca

original: ‘kiṁvādī samaṇo kimakkhāyī’ti?
analyzed: ki vādī samaṇaḥ kim akkhāyi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhikkhave, daṇḍapāṇiṁ sakkaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aha bhikkhave daṇḍapāṇim sakkam etat avoca

original: ‘yathāvādī kho, āvuso, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya
analyzed: yathāvādī khalu āvuso sa devake loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇiyā pajāya

original: sadevamanussāya na kenaci loke viggayha tiṭṭhati, yathā ca pana kāmehi visaṁyuttaṁ
analyzed: sa deva manussāya na kenacid loke viggayha tiṭṭhati yathā ca pana kāmehi

original: viharantaṁ taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ akathaṅkathiṁ chinnakukkuccaṁ bhavābhave vītataṇhaṁ saññā nānusenti—
analyzed: viharantam tam brāhmaṇam akathaṅkathim chinna kukkuccam bhava abhave vīta taṇham saññāḥ na anusenti

original: evaṁvādī kho ahaṁ, āvuso, evamakkhāyī’ti.
analyzed: eva vādī kho aha āvuso evam akkhāyi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhikkhave, daṇḍapāṇi sakko sīsaṁ okampetvā, jivhaṁ nillāḷetvā, tivisākhaṁ nalāṭikaṁ nalāṭe vuṭṭhāpetvā daṇḍamolubbha pakkāmī”ti.
analyzed: evam vutte bhikkhave daṇḍapāṇi sakkaḥ sīsam okampetvā jivham nillāḷetvā tivisākham nalāṭikam nalāṭe vuṭṭhāpetvā daṇḍam olubbha pakkāmi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte aññataraḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “kiṁvādī pana, bhante, bhagavā sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya na kenaci loke viggayha tiṭṭhati?
analyzed: ki vādī pana bhante bhagavā sa devake loke sa mārake sa brahmake sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇiyā pajāya sa deva manussāya na kenacid loke viggayha tiṭṭhati

original: Kathañca pana, bhante, bhagavantaṁ kāmehi visaṁyuttaṁ viharantaṁ taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ akathaṅkathiṁ chinnakukkuccaṁ bhavābhave vītataṇhaṁ saññā nānusentī”ti?
analyzed: katham ca pana bhante bhagavantam kāmehi visayuttam viharantam tam brāhmaṇam akathaṅkathim chinna kukkuccam bhava abhave vīta taṇham saññāḥ na anusenti iti

original: “Yatonidānaṁ, bhikkhu, purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti.
analyzed: yatonidāna bhikkhu purisam papañca saññā saṅkhāḥ samudācaranti

original: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
analyzed: ettha ce na atthi abhinanditabbam abhivaditabbam ajjhositabba

original: Esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ, esevanto paṭighānusayānaṁ, esevanto diṭṭhānusayānaṁ, esevanto
analyzed: esevanto rāga anusayānaṃ esevanto paṭigha anusayānaṃ esevanto diṭṭha anusayānaṃ esevanto

original: vicikicchānusayānaṁ, esevanto mānānusayānaṁ, esevanto bhavarāgānusayānaṁ, esevanto
analyzed: vicikicchā anusayāne esevantaḥ māna anusayāne esevantaḥ bhava rāga anusayāne esevantaḥ

original: avijjānusayānaṁ, esevanto daṇḍādānasatthādānakalahaviggahavivādatuvaṁtuvaṁpesuññamusāvādānaṁ.
analyzed: esevantaḥ daṇḍa ādāna sattha ādāna kalaha viggaha vivāda tuva tuva pesuñña musāvādāna

original: Etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī”ti.
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakā akusalāḥ dhammāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: idam vatvāna sugataḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram pāvisi

original: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho tesam bhikkhūnam acira pakkantassa bhagavato etat ahosi

original: “idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā, vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā, uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: idam kho no āvuso bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘yatonidānaṁ, bhikkhu, purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti.
analyzed: yatonidāna bhikkhu purisam papañca saññā saṅkhāḥ samudācaranti

original: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
analyzed: ettha ce na atthi abhinanditabbam abhivaditabbam ajjhositabba

original: Esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: rāga anusayānam pe

original: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti.
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakā akusalāḥ dhammāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti iti

original: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajeyya ati

original: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho tesam bhikkhūnam etat ahosi

original: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
analyzed: ayam kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ca iva savaṇṇitaḥ sambhāvitaḥ ca viññūnam sabrahmacārīna

original: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
analyzed: pahoti ca ayasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajitu

original: Yannūna mayaṁ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna mayam yena āyasmai mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkameyyāmaḥ upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākaccānam etam attham paṭipuccheyyāma ati

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākaccānena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū yena āyasmā mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākaccānena saddhim sammodisu

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam mahākaccānam etat avocuḥ

original: “idaṁ kho no, āvuso kaccāna, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: idam kho no āvuso kaccāna bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘yatonidānaṁ, bhikkhu, purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti.
analyzed: yatonidāna bhikkhu purisam papañca saññā saṅkhāḥ samudācaranti

original: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
analyzed: ettha ce na atthi abhinanditabbam abhivaditabbam ajjhositabba

original: Esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: rāga anusayānam pe

original: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti.
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakā akusalāḥ dhammāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti iti

original: Tesaṁ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṁ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
analyzed: tesam naḥ āvuso kaccāna amhākam acira pakkantassa bhagavataḥ etat ahosi

original: ‘idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: idam kho no āvuso bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: “yatonidānaṁ, bhikkhu, purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti.
analyzed: yatonidāna bhikkhu purisam papañca saññā saṅkhāḥ samudācaranti

original: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
analyzed: ettha ce na atthi abhinanditabbam abhivaditabbam ajjhositabba

original: Esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: rāga anusayānam pe

original: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī”’ti.
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakā akusalāḥ dhammāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti iti

original: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyāti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajeyya ati

original: Tesaṁ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṁ etadahosi:
analyzed: tesam naḥ āvuso kaccāna amhākam etat ahosi

original: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
analyzed: ayam kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ca iva savaṇṇitaḥ sambhāvitaḥ ca viññūnam sabrahmacārīna

original: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena
analyzed: pahoti ca ayasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena

original: atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
analyzed: attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajitu

original: Yannūna mayaṁ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāmā’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna mayam yena āyasmai mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkameyyāmaḥ upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākaccānam etam attham paṭipuccheyyāma ati

original: Vibhajatāyasmā mahākaccāno”ti.
analyzed: vibhajata ayasmai mahākaccānoti

original: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso purisaḥ sāratthikaḥ sāra gavesī sāra pariyesanam caramānaḥ mahataḥ

original: rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva mūlaṁ, atikkamma khandhaṁ, sākhāpalāse sāraṁ
analyzed: rukkhassa tiṭṭhataḥ sāravataḥ atikkamma iva mūla atikkamma khandha sākhāpalāse sāra

original: pariyesitabbaṁ maññeyya;
analyzed: pariyesitabbam maññeyya

original: evaṁsampadamidaṁ āyasmantānaṁ satthari sammukhībhūte, taṁ bhagavantaṁ atisitvā, amhe etamatthaṁ paṭipucchitabbaṁ maññatha.
analyzed: eva sampadam idam āyasmantānam satthari sammukhībhūte tam bhagavantam atisitvā amhe etam attham paṭipucchitabbam maññatha

original: So hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto, vattā pavattā, atthassa ninnetā, amatassa dātā, dhammassāmī tathāgato.
analyzed: saḥ ha āvuso bhagavā jānam jānāti passam passati cakkhu bhūtaḥ ñāṇa bhūtaḥ dhamma bhūtaḥ brahma bhūtaḥ vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhamma ssāmī tathāgato

original: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi, yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha.
analyzed: saḥ ca iva pana itassa kālaḥ ahosi yam bhagavantayā iva etam attham paṭipuccheyyātha

original: Yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṁ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
analyzed: yathā vaḥ bhagavā byākareyya tathā nam dhāreyyātha ati

original: “Addhāvuso kaccāna, bhagavā jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto, vattā pavattā, atthassa ninnetā, amatassa dātā, dhammassāmī tathāgato.
analyzed: addhā āvuso kaccāna bhagavā jānam jānāti passam passati cakkhu bhūtaḥ ñāṇa bhūtaḥ dhamma bhūtaḥ brahma bhūtaḥ vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhamma ssāmī tathāgato

original: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi, yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāma.
analyzed: saḥ ca iva pana itassa kālaḥ ahosi yam bhagavantayā iva etam attham paṭipuccheyyāma

original: Yathā no bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṁ dhāreyyāma.
analyzed: yathā naḥ bhagavā byākareyya tathā nam dhāreyyāma

original: Api cāyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
analyzed: api ca ayasmai mahākaccāno satthu ca iva savaṇṇitaḥ sambhāvitaḥ ca viññūnam sabrahmacārīna

original: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
analyzed: pahoti ca ayasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajitu

original: Vibhajatāyasmā mahākaccāno agaruṁ katvā”ti.
analyzed: vibhajata ayasmai mahākaccāno agarum katvā ati

original: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasikarotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena ha āvuso suṇātha sādhukam manasikarotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmataḥ mahākaccānassa paccassosu

original: Āyasmā mahākaccāno etadavoca:
analyzed: mahākaccāno etat avoca

original: “Yaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: yam kho no āvuso bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘yatonidānaṁ, bhikkhu, purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti.
analyzed: yatonidāna bhikkhu purisam papañca saññā saṅkhāḥ samudācaranti

original: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ, esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbam abhivaditabbam ajjhositabbaḥ esevantaḥ rāga anusayānam pe

original: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti, imassa kho ahaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti iti imassa kho aha āvuso bhagavatā

original: saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi—
analyzed: saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham avibhattassa evam vitthārena attham ājānāmi

original: Cakkhuñcāvuso, paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā
analyzed: cakkhum ca āvuso paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇa tiṇṇam saṅgati phassaḥ phassa paccayā

original: vedanā, yaṁ vedeti taṁ sañjānāti, yaṁ sañjānāti taṁ vitakketi, yaṁ vitakketi taṁ
analyzed: vedanāḥ yam vedeti tam sañjānāti yam sañjānāti tam vitakketi yam vitakketi tam

original: papañceti, yaṁ papañceti tatonidānaṁ purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti atītānāgatapaccuppannesu
analyzed: papañca iti yam papañca iti tatonidānam purisam papañca saññā saṅkhā samudācaranti atīta anāgata paccuppannesu

original: cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu.
analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyesu rūpesu

original: Sotañcāvuso, paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
analyzed: sotam ca āvuso paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sota viññāṇam pe

original: ghānañcāvuso, paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ghānam ca āvuso paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghāna viññāṇam pe

original: jivhañcāvuso, paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ …pe…
analyzed: jivham ca āvuso paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhā viññāṇam pe

original: kāyañcāvuso, paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
analyzed: kāyam ca āvuso paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāya viññāṇam pe

original: manañcāvuso, paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā
analyzed: manam ca āvuso paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manaḥ viññāṇa tiṇṇam saṅgati phassaḥ phassa paccayā

original: vedanā, yaṁ vedeti taṁ sañjānāti, yaṁ sañjānāti taṁ vitakketi, yaṁ vitakketi taṁ
analyzed: vedanāḥ yam vedeti tam sañjānāti yam sañjānāti tam vitakketi yam vitakketi tam

original: papañceti, yaṁ papañceti tatonidānaṁ purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti atītānāgatapaccuppannesu
analyzed: papañca iti yam papañca iti tatonidānam purisam papañca saññā saṅkhā samudācaranti atīta anāgata paccuppannesu

original: manoviññeyyesu dhammesu.
analyzed: manaḥ viññeyyesu dhammesu

original: So vatāvuso, cakkhusmiṁ sati rūpe sati cakkhuviññāṇe sati phassapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata āvuso cakkhusmim sati rūpe sati cakkhu viññāṇe sati phassa paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: Phassapaññattiyā sati vedanāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: phassa paññattiyā sati vedanā paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: Vedanāpaññattiyā sati saññāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vedanā paññattiyā sati saññā paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: Saññāpaññattiyā sati vitakkapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saññā paññattiyā sati vitakka paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: Vitakkapaññattiyā sati papañcasaññāsaṅkhāsamudācaraṇapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vitakka paññattiyā sati papañca saññā saṅkhā samudācaraṇa paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: So vatāvuso, sotasmiṁ sati sadde sati …pe…
analyzed: saḥ vata avuso sotasmim sati sadde sati pe

original: ghānasmiṁ sati gandhe sati …pe…
analyzed: sati gandhe sati pe

original: jivhāya sati rase sati …pe…
analyzed: sati rase sati pe

original: kāyasmiṁ sati phoṭṭhabbe sati …pe…
analyzed: kāyasmim sati phoṭṭhabbe sati pe

original: manasmiṁ sati dhamme sati manoviññāṇe sati phassapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: manasmin sati dhamme sati manaḥ viññāṇe sati phassa paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: Phassapaññattiyā sati vedanāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: phassa paññattiyā sati vedanā paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: Vedanāpaññattiyā sati saññāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vedanā paññattiyā sati saññā paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: Saññāpaññattiyā sati vitakkapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saññā paññattiyā sati vitakka paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: Vitakkapaññattiyā sati papañcasaññāsaṅkhāsamudācaraṇapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vitakka paññattiyā sati papañca saññā saṅkhā samudācaraṇa paññattim paññāpessati iti ṭhānam etam vijjati

original: So vatāvuso, cakkhusmiṁ asati rūpe asati cakkhuviññāṇe asati phassapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata āvuso cakkhusmim asati rūpe asati cakkhu viññāṇe asati phassa paññattim paññāpessati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Phassapaññattiyā asati vedanāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: phassa paññattiyāḥ asati vedanā paññattim paññāpessati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Vedanāpaññattiyā asati saññāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vedanā paññattiyāḥ asati saññā paññattim paññāpessati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Saññāpaññattiyā asati vitakkapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saññā paññattiyāḥ asati vitakka paññattim paññāpessati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Vitakkapaññattiyā asati papañcasaññāsaṅkhāsamudācaraṇapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vitakka paññattiyāḥ asati papañca saññā saṅkhā samudācaraṇa paññattim paññāpessati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: So vatāvuso, sotasmiṁ asati sadde asati …pe…
analyzed: saḥ vata avuso sotasmim asati sadde asati pe

original: ghānasmiṁ asati gandhe asati …pe…
analyzed: asati gandhe asati

original: jivhāya asati rase asati …pe…
analyzed: jivhāya asati rase asati pe

original: kāyasmiṁ asati phoṭṭhabbe asati …pe…
analyzed: kāyasmin asati phoṭṭhabbe asati pe

original: manasmiṁ asati dhamme asati manoviññāṇe asati phassapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: manasmin asati dhamme asati manaḥ viññāṇe asati phassa paññattim paññāpessati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Phassapaññattiyā asati vedanāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: phassa paññattiyāḥ asati vedanā paññattim paññāpessati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Vedanāpaññattiyā asati saññāpaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vedanā paññattiyāḥ asati saññā paññattim paññāpessati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Saññāpaññattiyā asati vitakkapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saññā paññattiyāḥ asati vitakka paññattim paññāpessati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Vitakkapaññattiyā asati papañcasaññāsaṅkhāsamudācaraṇapaññattiṁ paññāpessatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vitakka paññattiyāḥ asati papañca saññā saṅkhā samudācaraṇa paññattim paññāpessati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Yaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: yam kho no āvuso bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘yatonidānaṁ, bhikkhu, purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: yatonidāna bhikkhu purisam papañca saññā saṅkhā samudācaranti ettha ce na atthi abhinanditabbam abhivaditabbam ajjhositabbam esevantaḥ rāga anusayānam pe

original: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti, imassa kho ahaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti iti imassa kho aha āvuso bhagavatā

original: saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi.
analyzed: saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham avibhattassa evam vitthārena attham ājānāmi

original: Ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṁyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha.
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmantaḥ bhagavantayā iva upasaṅkamitvā etam attham paṭipuccheyyātha

original: Yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṁ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
analyzed: yathā vaḥ bhagavā byākaroti tathā nam dhāreyyātha ati

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmataḥ mahākaccānassa bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā

original: yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “yaṁ kho no, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: yam kho naḥ bhante bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: ‘yatonidānaṁ, bhikkhu, purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti.
analyzed: yatonidāna bhikkhu purisam papañca saññā saṅkhāḥ samudācaranti

original: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
analyzed: ettha ce na atthi abhinanditabbam abhivaditabbam ajjhositabba

original: Esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: rāga anusayānam pe

original: etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī’ti.
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakā akusalāḥ dhammāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti iti

original: Tesaṁ no, bhante, amhākaṁ acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi:
analyzed: tesam naḥ bhante amhākam acira pakkantassa bhagavato etat ahosi

original: ‘idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
analyzed: idam kho no āvuso bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesam uddisitvā vitthārena attham a vibhajitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā vihāram paviṭṭhaḥ

original: “yatonidānaṁ, bhikkhu, purisaṁ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti.
analyzed: yatonidāna bhikkhu purisam papañca saññā saṅkhāḥ samudācaranti

original: Ettha ce natthi abhinanditabbaṁ abhivaditabbaṁ ajjhositabbaṁ.
analyzed: ettha ce na atthi abhinanditabbam abhivaditabbam ajjhositabba

original: Esevanto rāgānusayānaṁ, esevanto paṭighānusayānaṁ, esevanto diṭṭhānusayānaṁ, esevanto
analyzed: esevanto rāga anusayānaṃ esevanto paṭigha anusayānaṃ esevanto diṭṭha anusayānaṃ esevanto

original: vicikicchānusayānaṁ, esevanto mānānusayānaṁ, esevanto bhavarāgānusayānaṁ, esevanto
analyzed: vicikicchā anusayāne esevantaḥ māna anusayāne esevantaḥ bhava rāga anusayāne esevantaḥ

original: avijjānusayānaṁ, esevanto daṇḍādānasatthādānakalahaviggahavivādatuvaṁtuvaṁpesuññamusāvādānaṁ.
analyzed: esevantaḥ daṇḍa ādāna sattha ādāna kalaha viggaha vivāda tuva tuva pesuñña musāvādāna

original: Etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantī”ti.
analyzed: ettha ete pāpakā akusalāḥ dhammāḥ aparisesāḥ nirujjhanti iti

original: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā’ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajeyya ati

original: Tesaṁ no, bhante, amhākaṁ etadahosi:
analyzed: tesam naḥ bhante amhākam etat ahosi

original: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
analyzed: ayam kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ca iva savaṇṇitaḥ sambhāvitaḥ ca viññūnam sabrahmacārīna

original: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena
analyzed: pahoti ca ayasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena

original: atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ, yannūna mayaṁ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno
analyzed: attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham vibhajitu yat nūna mayam yena ayasmai mahākaccāno

original: tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāmā’ti.
analyzed: tena upasaṅkameyyāmaḥ upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākaccānam etam attham paṭipuccheyyāma ati

original: Atha kho mayaṁ, bhante, yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamimha; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etamatthaṁ paṭipucchimha.
analyzed: atha kho bhante yena āyasmā mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkamimha upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākaccānam etam attham paṭipucchimha

original: Tesaṁ no, bhante, āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi attho vibhatto”ti.
analyzed: tesam naḥ bhante āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi atthaḥ vibhattaḥ ti

original: “Paṇḍito, bhikkhave, mahākaccāno; mahāpañño, bhikkhave, mahākaccāno.
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ bhikkhave mahākaccānaḥ mahā paññaḥ bhikkhave mahākaccānaḥ

original: Mañcepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi taṁ evamevaṁ byākareyyaṁ yathā taṁ mahākaccānena byākataṁ.
analyzed: mañce pi tumhe bhikkhave etam attham paṭipuccheyyātha aham pi tam evam evam byākareyyam yathā tam mahākaccānena byākata

original: Eso cevetassa attho. Evañca naṁ dhārethā”ti.
analyzed: esaḥ ceva itassa atthaḥ evam ca nam dhāretha ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “seyyathāpi, bhante, puriso jighacchādubbalyapareto madhupiṇḍikaṁ adhigaccheyya, so yato yato sāyeyya, labhetheva sādurasaṁ asecanakaṁ.
analyzed: sa iyyathā api bhante purisaḥ jighacchā dubbalya paretaḥ madhu piṇḍikam adhigaccheyya saḥ yatas yatas sāyeyya labhetha iva sādurasam asecanaka

original: Evameva kho, bhante, cetaso bhikkhu dabbajātiko, yato yato imassa dhammapariyāyassa paññāya atthaṁ upaparikkheyya, labhetheva attamanataṁ, labhetheva cetaso pasādaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante cetasaḥ bhikkhu dabba jātikaḥ yatas yatas imassa dhammapariyāyassa paññāya attham upaparikkheyya labhetha iva atta manata labhetha iva cetasaḥ pasāda

original: Ko nāmo ayaṁ, bhante, dhammapariyāyo”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nāma aya bhante dhammapariyāyaḥ ti

original: “Tasmātiha tvaṁ, ānanda, imaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotveva naṁ dhārehī”ti.
analyzed: tasmāt ati ha tvam ānanda imam dhammapariyāyam madhupiṇḍika pariyāya utvā iva nam dhārehi iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Madhupiṇḍikasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: madhupiṇḍika suttam niṭṭhitam aṭṭhama
